Headline: #J14 Jeffery Jump Temporary Reroute near Jeffery/73rd
ShortDescription: J14 Jeffery Jump buses are rerouted in both directions: due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#J14 Jeffery Jump buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions: 

Northbound via Jeffery, 73rd, Yates, 71st, Jeffery, and resume normal route.
Southbound via Jeffery, 67th, Stony Island, 73rd, Jeffery and resume normal route due to street blockage near Jeffery/73rd.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Peoria
ShortDescription: #79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Ashland and 79th due to street blockage near 79th/Peoria.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 79th, Halsted, 76th, Ashland, then will resume their normal route on 79th.

Allow extra travel time.

Why is service being changed?

Buses are rerouted due to street blockage near 79th/Peoria.
